Description: Small flint blade with very find retouch along one side, some cortex remaining at one end.
Curator's comments: One of 5 flint flakes mentioned by Brunton in his tomb register for Grave 5104
Bibliographic references: Brunton & Caton-Thompson 1928 / The Badarian Civilisation and Predynastic Remains near Badari (pl. V)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
